English: Summoned items only apply to Portals, Pirate Ships, Traveling Cart, etc.
Sets all frequencies to Normal and spawn location to Anywhere on the Board.
When disallowed, only normal portals will spawn.
Strange Portals usually spawn every fourth moon, starting on the ninth moon
Rare Portals normally replace every fourth Stange Portal.
Pirate Ships usually spawn every seventh moon.
Travelling Cart is only spawned on even moons, usually 10% of#the time, starting with the tenth moon.
